Reviews.Title: It's fine
Reviews.Author: S. Durham
Reviews.Content: The camera is fine and actually stores pictures a little faster than most digital cameras but I'm returning mine.  An optical zoom is so standard on cameras that I didn't even notice that this camera didn't have one.  It does have a digital zoom but on this camera, it's useless.  If you use the digital zoom at all you loose resolution... and not just a little.  The picture is severly compromised.  So, if you never ever anticipate the need to zoom, not even a little, it's a decent camera.

Reviews.Title: A wonderful Camera
Reviews.Author: Madi
Reviews.Content: I just bought the A503 yesterday,after my Polaroid izone 300 was stolen, and I am amazed. It is a wonderful camera(and a vast change from the izone)! It takes great quality photos and has tons of great features, like the cute little frames, and the different colors. It even does great for nature photos, like flowers, close up. I took a picture of a sunflower, and I could see every single seed in the flower. I am totally amazed with this camera. It is a great buy!

Reviews.Title: a very good deal
Reviews.Author: May
Reviews.Content: I got a red one from Walmart. Very nice little DC at a very good price.  I'm a casual user so I don't expect a fancy one. Samsung Digimax A503 gives you great color pictures with details plus some interesting built-in special effects, which will really put a smile on your face when you see it...^)^ I also love the tiny size so I can put it in my pocket without buying a camera bag. The 2.0" LCD screen is pretty big for the size of camera.I definitely will give it a 5-star!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Steph4587 "Steph"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera (in black)after returning the iZone 330 by Poleroid. It is such an improvment!!! It takes great pictures, they are very clear!! Its so small and durable. The LCD screen is huge, so u can see the pictures, no squinting needed!! I havent used the video for anymore than a min or two; that seems to work well too. I Love this camera! It is everything you want in a camera. If you get re-chargeable batteries, you'll be all set with the perfect camera.

Reviews.Title: A 13 Year Old's Review
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! I'd been saving up for a digital camera for awhile and finally found one at a good price. There are 3 colors to choose from, red, black, and silver. (I got black because Walmart didn't carry silver for some reason.) The 5 MP makes for great quality photos. For once I have something better than my electronic-crazy dad! There are cool colors and frames that I use a lot, and even a feature that makes it possible to put up to four pics in one photo. I have this camera everywhere I go and can't wait to take it to Florida this week! For a great quality camera at a great price this is a user-friendly camera for all ages!

Reviews.Title: best camera, great price
Reviews.Content: I am 13 and have gotten stuck with stupid cameras with mood swings, but this is definetly an awesome camera.  the digital zoom is not super fantastic but it works. I love it because if you have a 1gb memory card then you can take up to over 1000 pictures on normal mode, and around 350 on super fine mode, it is awesome, plus the batteries are AAs so they are very sheap and easy to find. Overall i would say if you dont want to spend a lot of money but still want a good, quality camera, this is for you

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Augustine York
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Digimax A503 is my second digital camera. I read a lot of reviews on this site before purchasing it at a local store, and it was definitely the right choice.Along with the camera I bought a 512MB memory card. With the settings on my camera, I can take over 1000 pictures.A few weeks after purchasing it I brought it on a trip to NYC, Philly, Baltimore, and DC. The camera faired very well, the battery life was good (I use rechargables), and I got tons of great pictures in all sorts of weather and settings.The only thing I can say is that you have to hold VERY still when you zoom in, and even then the quality isn't the best. But my camera might just not be on the best setting.Overall, very good camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great first time camera
Reviews.Author: B. Brackman
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera other than in a cell phone.  It is extremely easy to use.  I spent 45 minutes going through the manual with the camera.  I recommend downloading the manual from the samsung website.  It is much easier than trying to hold the book open and fidget with the camera at the same time.The features are very easy to manipulate and use.  Usually it is just 1 button away.  Even if you forget exactly how to do something, You can maneuver around without "messing" stuff up.One more thing.  I am disabled and have limited use of my hands.  The way this camera is shaped and the position of the lens and buttons make it relatively easy to figure a way to hold the camera.  The big shutter button or whatever makes things pretty sweet also.  Most cameras are sort of square shaped; this camera is more oblong.Great price too.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Melisa Snyder "Mi-chan"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera as a present and I must say that it is quite good.  The zoom works well, it doesn't come in blurry at all.  I love the color filters in this camera, it can add a lot of depth to pictures.  It captures video and the video is pretty good too.  I found that this camera was easy to figure out as far as menues go, which is saying a lot considering I have a really difficult time with a lot of other cameras.  The only reason this is missing a star is because it's a bit of a battery eater.

Reviews.Title: exactly what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: K. Stuckey "kateling"
Reviews.Content: With my annual trek to Nashville fast approaching, I wanted a pocket-size camera to replace my aging Sony CyberShot that won't hold a charge anymore. The technology has come a long way in the five years since I got into digital! This sweet model was exactly what I wanted and for even a little less than what I was willing to spend. I spent about half an hour playing around with it when I got it home and felt I had mastered the controls. They are super easy and the camera itself is not much bigger than my cel phone which makes it handy and I think I'll take a lot more pix now. I can adjust the size and resolution of the photos, which is great and the 'negative' effect is fun too. It runs on 2 AA batteries, so long as I keep spares handy, I forsee a lot of use for this baby. This is definitely a bargain for the money!

Reviews.Title: nice pocket camera - images great, video only OK
Reviews.Author: K. Crysler "kristyc94"
Reviews.Content: I wanted an inexpensive pocket-size camera to catch those spontaneous cute moments with the kids.  This camera had really good still shots for the money, lots of fun built-ins (like present frames, highlights and color blocking) and is very easy to use.  The video was important to me, and if I wouldn't have tried another camera at the same time, I probably would have kept this camera. But the 640 video didn't measure up to the other camera I tried. If you weren't going to use the video feature much, this is a FUN, good quality little camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera suitable for Every one's Budget
Reviews.Author: Vamshi Annangi
Reviews.Content: I love the Samsung Digimax A503, it's small so I do not have to worry about it taking up too much space. The quality of the pictures is wonderful, just perfect. It is easy to understand and if you lose your manual, there is a website, which is an extra bonus. The price is amazing, This is a great price, A digital camera for anyone for whom price is an important consideration when buying a camera, it's small, easy to understand and it does everything. So thank you, Samsung, for supplying a wonderful product for my family and I to enjoy.CheersVamshi Annagi

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Steph4587 "Steph"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera (in black)after returning the iZone 330 by Poleroid. It is such an improvment!!! It takes great pictures, they are very clear!! Its so small and durable. The LCD screen is huge, so u can see the pictures, no squinting needed!! I havent used the video for anymore than a min or two; that seems to work well too. I Love this camera! It is everything you want in a camera. If you get re-chargeable batteries, you'll be all set with the perfect camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice Little Camera
Reviews.Author: J. Hanna "There is nothing more enjoyable tha...
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect digital camera for a perosn on a budget.  For along time I had wanted to buy a camera with a higher resolution than my VGA, but I was not willing to pay 200+ dollars to do this.  So when I saw this model on sale for $120 dollars at Kmart I felt it was a good buy and the perfect birthday persent for myself.  However, I recommend buying the memory card because you can only store eight pictures on the camera itself.  Also, I noticed other reviewers were correct in pointing out how this camera lacks the zoom quality of other cameras.  Even though this camera has a few flaws, it is the perfect thing for the beginner that might accidentally drop their camera once and awhile.  Not that I purposely go around dropping my camera, but my niece accidentally dropped it a few times and it still works fine.  This camera would make a great gift for kids because it is easy to use and durable.

Reviews.Title: great little family camera
Reviews.Author: Deborah Grissom
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a camera like this for a long time.  After doing some research on digitalcamerareview.com the Samsung Digimax A503 was the best camera for my needs.  I'm not exactly a photo freak, but I do have 4 wonderful kids that are growing up fast.  This camera has been a excellent experience.  The screen is huge and the photos are almost perfect.  There is sometimes an issue when I have the flash on and the little "shaking hand" icon comes up.  I highly recommend also buying a memory card because the camera does have a small memory.  Overall, this is a great basic photographer camera.

Reviews.Title: samsung rocks!
Reviews.Content: The controls on this camera are not hard to figure out.It is fun to haveall the little things you can do with the pictures and being 12 almost 13,photogerphy is somthing I love to do with this camera.If you think thiscamera is to complicated,well you didnt read the instruction guide very well.

Reviews.Title: My Daughter (15) Loves it!
Reviews.Author: Patrick Cronin
Reviews.Content: Hi....I purchased this camera for my daughter after looking at several "in person" at Best Buy and then looking far and wide on the net.  this camera was her choice and she has loved using it.  So, while, I've not used it myself I can safely say that this was a good purchase at a good price.  Also the black case makes it quite "hip" or at least I'm told since at 65 my "hipness" days maybe behind me! <g>

Reviews.Title: Quality camera
Reviews.Author: Kevin Shah
Reviews.Content: This is a very good camera at a great price.  The only drawbacks are the lack of digital zoom and possibly the reliability of the manufacturer for digital cameras (samsung).  Other than that, it does everything it advertises very well.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Ambar Jacobo "AMBER JACOBO"
Reviews.Content: This camera is small, easy to use, and perfect for the price. It has so many features. The one thing I love is that the date is on every picutre even when you print it out. I recommend this camera to everybody!

Reviews.Title: Great Digital Camera on a Low Budget
Reviews.Author: Michael DeFrancesco
Reviews.Content: If you can do without a zoom lens, this is a great little, inexpensive digital camera. Actually, because it does not have a zoom lens it starts up fast, has a slim design and is less expensive than comparable models with a zoom. I rarely have a need for a zoom lens anyway. Also, It makes a great second or backup camera when your rechargeable battery camera is dead and you don't have 1 or 2 hours to recharge batteries for it. The A503 uses AAs. You can use any AAs from real cheap ones to the more expensive AA lithiums. (The new AA NiOX batteries promise to be exceptional for the price.) Other digital cameras I have are a Pentax ist DS (SLR) and a Canon SD400. The picture quality of the Samsung A503 is almost on par with either of them at a fraction of the cost, but without the extra features.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Mrs. B.
Reviews.Content: Well, I just got this camera yesterday, and I must say, I am impressed! The features are neat, and the lcd screen is pretty big.  I haven't used all the features, but so far, it's really easy to use! The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because there was some confusion in regards to installing the cd, which the written instructions could've been more clear on.  Other than that, a great camera!

Reviews.Title: Worst Customer Service Ever- My Edited Rating: 1 Star
Reviews.Author: D. Saxena "dev080"
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera about 2 weeks now and I must say the picture quality is pretty great. Outdoor and indoor photos look good-- on the computer screen and also when printed.  It is easy to use and quite small. I did find that using the zoom made the picture blurry. Still I give it 4 stars!Ok, since I wrote the top portion of this review, my camera has stopped working. I only had this camera 3 months and now it doesn't even turn on. I sent it back to Samsung in October 2006 and I still have not received the replacement camera that the customer service promised me months ago! The camera is ok, but Samsung customer service is the WORST! I have called them at least 7-8 times in the last few months and everytime I call they say they will send me a new camera in a few days...yah I'm still waiting.  I'm so disappointed! If you are thinking of buying one, just think about the headache it'll cost you if anything should happend to go wrong with it and if you already bought this camera, you better start praying your doesn't have a glitch in it like mine did! If I could change my review, I'd give it 1 star.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera for teens
Reviews.Author: S. Woodward "tech savy!!!"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my twin girls. They love it pictures are crisp. We take them in 5mp resolution and S fine. mode with a 1gb Sandisk Sd card. I was a little leary of this purchase. after reading mixed reviews from several different websites. However, I am pleasantly surprised at the details. It also has nice clip art to add to the photos. It has a mode composite. you cant take up to 4 different poses and print it out on one piece of photo paper. Perfect for the photgenic teenager. Just purchased today need to explore the movie mode sound? I am so far satisfied. You will not be disappointed in this low end camera. If you really need it for the video function. You may be a little unhappy as the movie mode record in vga mode.***UPDATE 12/31/06 Baterry life is terrible. Need new batteries everyday of use. can take about 20 pictures in 5mp mode, and thatis paying attntion to turn it off after each picture and not spending a lot of time reviewing photos on camera

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: Courtney Carmichael
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera. I have had it now for about 2 or 3 years. It has held up amazingly. That poor camera has been dropped, gotten wet, banged around in my purse(with no case) and still takes pictures as good as the day I got it. The price was very affordable. I would recomend camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: the best
Reviews.Content: I decided I wanted this a while before i got it. As I read reveiws I realized majority of them were postive. There is nothing wrong with it, the microphone works really good but you can not watch your videos with sound on the camera. It can take around 300 some pictures and about 60 minutes of video on Super sine mode, where it uses the most megapixels. It is definetly something I would recommend for anyone.

Reviews.Title: From a new camera user
Reviews.Author: T. P. Edin "timedin"
Reviews.Content: This camera is fun to use and easy too.  It is a great size to keep in my coat pocket at all times.  Also with a 1 GB memory card I can take many many pictures and the battery lasted a few weeks before needing recharge.  Overall this is a good buy and value.

Reviews.Title: Bought for 8 yr old Daughter GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Lar Ray "Lar Ray"
Reviews.Content: I purchased for 9 yr old and it's a great camera.  Takes excellent qulaity.  Battery life is good.  My Cannon and Nikon are really no better.  she takes pictures of everything and never a flaw.  Seems to be a very sturdy camera built very well.  I bought becasue the Samsung name.  I have purchased many Samsung products before and was very happy with them.  I've used theri customer service for other products and I've found them quick in respnse and helpful.  I would recommend this camera for any age child or adult.  +++ The only thnig I don't like is the lens does not cover when off.  I have not experienced any problems but I am keeping an eye out just in case.  I still recommend this quality camera.

Reviews.Title: mostly good but a few problems
Reviews.Author: Mary "Mary"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my budding 10.5 year old photographer son.  He loved the camera, it has great features, however as others have said it is a battery eater.  There should be an adaptor option or battery charge option.  Yeaterday my son was walking around with camera in his pocket.  Maybe not the best move but he did not bang or drop the camera and yet the screen cracked.  Camera will still take pictures only you can't see what you're doing. An eyehole would have been helpful.  My son has only had this camera since 12/26 so I'm very disappointed

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: J   R
Reviews.Content: takes decent pictures in day with plenty of light but when the sun goes down or you are in a dimly lit room the pictures do not turn out well and trying to take a picture without the flash only works if you don't want to know what you were taking a picture of because they turn out blurry. Even after holding as still as possible and it looks decent on the display when you get them to the computer they are still blurry and out of focus.

Reviews.Title: I love Samsungs products but...
Reviews.Author: Mr. Sergio H. Sanchez "Mr. Sanchez"
Reviews.Content: This was a crappy camera. Didn't work as I expected and drained the juice of the batteries very fast. I was so disappointed to the point of return it back to the seller. My best option for a similar price range was a canon power-shot with more features and lasting durability and power options. Stay away from this.

Reviews.Title: works well in the field
Reviews.Author: Roger Fessenmeyer "1 Fess 2"
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera for the type of work we do and does not have the pop out lense that when you drop it it quits working. It fits in my front pocket just like a pen and it takes great pics. I wish they still made these for I wood buy 20 More of them.You dont have to be a rocket scientist tp operate it either. So for us we are going to give this device a 10

Reviews.Title: great service!
Reviews.Author: Esteban Lopez
Reviews.Content: i had a previous camera that i lost, and i got this one again because it's very eazy to use and very fast when connecting my pc

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Leslie Bowers "music lover"
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with the product, love the quality of the camera and the size. Takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good compact digital camera
Reviews.Author: G. G. Moreno
Reviews.Content: Payed a little and received two great extras (rechargable batteries and a 2 GB SD Card). Works great.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good, Some Issues
Reviews.Author: C. Rodenbough
Reviews.Content: I purchased this at walmart two years ago. All in all it was an alright camera, but I had some problems with it.Pros:-I liked how you could choose to take pictures in different hues such as black and white, sepia, blue, red, and green.- The camera is small, so it fits just about anywhere.- The colors ( I have black) are nice, I would have chosen red, but they were out of stock.-The price is good. It was about $99.00 when I purchased it, and I'm sure it has gone down since then.Cons:-The zoom goes up to 5.0, which is alright, but most of the pictures I took with zoom came out very blurry, and even with extra editing they were still a little unclear.- Maybe it's just the color, but the black seemed to have rubbed off in places, and left white smudges. I tried to color over with them with permanent marker, but it wiped off after a few days.- If you get this camera I suggest you buy a set of rechargeable batteries. The camera sucks regular one-time use batteries dry, and it was annoying to keep buying more batteries after a short period of time.All in all it was an alright camera, but not the best.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: RA
Reviews.Content: works great, cheap price. i thinks its a great deal. good pictures, easy to use.  the batteries from dollar store don't work well, you have to buy 'good batteries'

Reviews.Title: bad for indoor pics
Reviews.Author: Kach
Reviews.Content: you can hardly get a great picture indoors bcos-- it's never bright, and looks like it was taken at night. Without the flash, picture comes out blurry. it's good for daytime outdoor shots though...

Reviews.Title: Fits its purpose
Reviews.Author: Sue "Sue"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 13-year old son to take with him on a soccer trip to Bermuda.  It was ok.  Felt sort of cheap, but seemed like it would do what it was supposed to.  BIG DRAWBACK....there is no lens cover that slips into place when a picture isn't being shot, so the danger of scratching the lens is immense.  My son was so afraid of scratching the lens, that he barely used it.  Some of the few pictures that he did take were ok, but others were not of the best quality.  I think this camera is a bit too costly for what you get, and I'm surprised, because I usually love Samsung products.

Reviews.Title: For the price it's a really nice camera
Reviews.Author: Christopher R. Cole
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a reasonably priced digital camera, and came across the Samsung Digimax A503. The price was right, in fact better than what I thought for a 5 megapixel camera, and all the previous reviews pointed to a really good product.Based on that, I purchased one, and so far I have to say I have not really been disappointed. The battery life is very good for a digital camera, and the picture quality is well above par. It is a very easy camera to use, and it comes with features that can make an average photographer such as myself take better than average pictures.For all its pros however there are a couple cons which I have found. The first is the onboard memory. In 5 megapixel mode, only 10 pictures can be stored, and that seems on the low end. The purchase of a memory card though solves that problem rather easily.The other thing is that it only has digital zoom. Granted, the digital zoom works well and the pictures turn out great. However as one other commentor pointed out, analog zoom is pretty much a standard feature in digital cameras, and to not have it is somewhat of a disappointment, though one I can live with. It's just having a sundae without the cherry on top.Overall, I cannot say I am unhappy with the product. There are certainly better digital cameras on the market, but not for the price this one lists at. I am very pleased that it arrived before it was scheduled to (as well as all the other things I have ordered from Amazon recently), and did not take long to set up, so I was using it shortly after I took it out of the package.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: GEORGE Dixon
Reviews.Content: daughter has had a great time using it.Size makes it easy to take it anywhere.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Nakasha Tirado "boricua1029"
Reviews.Content: i love this camera.. the only issue you have to use batteries...but other than that its a great little camera

Reviews.Title: samungs really sucks
Reviews.Author: Godwin A. Maria "Goddy"
Reviews.Content: Please dont buy this camera...i saw many good review and buyed the camera but i cant able to picturize any scenary itz really a bad condition.. After i returned the camera and bought a fuji in bestbuy it was really good and clear comparing samsung....

ProductInfo.Features:
5.2-megapixel CCD captures enough detail for photo-quality 13 x 17-inch prints
5x digital zoom with 8x playback zoom, 9 different photo frame effects
Composite Shot mode allows you to save 2-4 shots into a single file; PictBridge compatible
Point-and-shoot digital camera with 2-inch display
Store images in 32MB internal memory or on SD memory card
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Digimax A503 5MP Digital Camera (Silver)
